'''Terry''' is a casting director who appeared in "[[The One With Rachel's Assistant]]". He is played by [[Michael Kagan]].

== Character ==
Terry worked as the casting director for ''[[Days Of Our Lives]]''. He invited [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] to the studio for casting at the role of [[Stryker Ramoray]], but Joey felt offended that he should go through the casting and he refused to do it. When he lost the role in [[Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.]], Terry helped Joey to gain the role of [[Dr. Drake Ramoray]] at least (as Striker was already cast by a different actor) as Joey apologized for his behavior and asked for help.
